poem:
**Directorial Debuts at Cannes**

When actors step behind the lens,  
their eyes adjust to new horizons,  
scarved in directorial scarves—  
learning the sway of a different dance.  
At Cannes, the red carpet unfurls,  
a river of shimmering celluloid dreams.  
Here, familiar faces turn mysterious,  
carving stories in lights and shadow.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Career change: Scarlett Johansson, Kristen Stewart and Harris Dickinson to premiere directorial debuts at Cannes First-time directors with films premiering at Cannes next week would be forgiven for feeling nervous. But three of the directors who are unveiling their debut features in France are less likely than their peers to be quaking as they approach the red carpet. Related: Scarlett Johansson, Paul Mescal and Josh O’Connor set for Cannes 2025 as lineup announced Actors Scarlett". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Career change: Scarlett Johansson, Kristen Stewart and Harris Dickinson to premiere directorial debuts at Cannes First-time directors with films premiering at Cannes next week would be forgiven for feeling nervous. But three of the directors who are unveiling their debut features in France are less likely than their peers to be quaking as they approach the red carpet. Related: Scarlett Johansson, Paul Mescal and Josh O’Connor set for Cannes 2025 as lineup announced Actors Scarlett
